content.rendered:
Directed by Shaji Kailas

Written by Jinu Abraham

Star Prithviraj Sukumaran(Kaduvakunnel Kuriyachan). Vivek Oberoi(Joseph Chandy I.P.S.). Samyuktha Menon(Elsa). Siddique(D.G.P. Rajasekharan Marar I.P.S.). Vijayaraghavan(M.L.A. Divakara Kurup). Kalabhavan Shajohn(C.I. Dominic Benjamin). Dileesh Pothan(Adv. Paulson Behanan). Aju Varghese(Tehmur Salaam). Sudev Nair(Adv. Vincent Philip). Saikumar(Kuncheria). Seema(Theruthi Chedathi). Arjun Asokan(Victor). Janardanan(Ananthanathan C.M). Rahul Madhav(Fr. Robin Poovampara). Reenu Mathews(Elizabeth Koruthu). Priyanka Nair(Merin Joseph). Meenakshi(Feba). Vridhi Vishal(Eva Kurian (Kuriyachan’s Youngest Daughter)). Jaise Jose(S.I. Chandrababu). Kochu Preman(Ithakk). Sachin Khedekar(Adv. Satya Pal Singhvi)

Language Malayalam

Producers Listin Stephen. Prithviraj Sukumaran

Production Magic Frames
